name: StreamBingo
author: Fireworks (.fireworks)
install_msg: Thanks for installing StreamBingo! This isn't really usable without https://github.com/mFireworks/Viewer-Bingo setup properly, so be sure you know what you're doing before using this.
short: Personal Project for generating codes for bingo boards
description: Personal project for generating bingo board codes for my Viewer Bingo project, to let viewers generate boards that'll get filled in as a stream progresses.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does store ServerIDs and MemberIDs persistently, that way viewer's boards are kept track even after restarts. This data can be found in the `settings.json` of this cog in your bot's data directory.
